fullstack.title: Full Stack Web Development
fullstack.description: {{years}} years in Full Stack Web Dev: I craft enterprise-grade apps using .NET, JS/TS, Angular, React, SQL Server & T-SQL. Azure Certified expert in cloud solutions, microservices, Docker & Kubernetes.

devops.title: DevOps & Automation
devops.description: Once the application is built, I help clients set up DevOps testing, CI/CD pipelines, and deployment automation to support the successful Go-Live.

contact.title: Let's Create Something Amazing
contact.description1: Ready to bring your vision to life? With expertise in full-stack development and cloud architecture, I transform complex ideas into elegant, scalable solutions. Specializing in modern web technologies, microservices, and cloud-native applications, I can help you build robust and future-proof applications.
